item.title: Hotels
item.description:
Whether you stay in the city, or within the province, there are plenty of places to stay! Here are some of our recommendations.

item.title: Directions
item.description:
You can get to the location in the following ways:

  • Taxi
  • Public transit
  • Car

Taxi

Taxis: Taxi UVO

Phone number: 0595-412611

Alternatively, you can let a member of staff help you get a taxi.

Public Transit

There is a regular bus service that runs to around 11:30 PM, for the most accurate information check 9292.nl.

Please note that there is quite a walk from the bus stop to the ceremony and reception location.

By car

Directions

Parking

There is parking at the Regthuys.

item.title: Information
item.description:
Photo policy

Feel free to take some photos of your own, as long as you share them with us. If you do post on social media, please use the #jetfieldwedding hashtag.

Ceremony

Kerk van Wirdum

Kerkeweg 24,
9917 PJ Wirdum

The ceremony will be held in the church of Wirdum, a thirteenth century church within the Groninger countryside. An idyllic location due to the green and peaceful atmosphere.

Reception

’t Regthuys

Fromaweg 1,
9917 PK Wirdum

The reception will be held in the restaurant “’t Regthuys”. The Regthuys is a lovely restaurant in beautiful Wirdum, a quaint town in the Groninger countryside.

Both our ceremony and reception location are right across the street from each other

item.title: Schedule
item.description:
3:00 PM - Arrival at restaurant

3:30 PM - Ceremony in Church

4:30 PM - Prosecco and Alcohol Free Aperitif

5:00 PM - 3 Course dinner with included drinks

7:30 PM - Coffee/Tea and treats

8:00 PM - Party!

12:00 AM - Pierogies

12:30 AM - Send off with sparklers
